name: Holidays in Amsterdam
description: Holidays in Amsterdam is an adult variation of Frogger. The player's task is to guide a vacationer across a road full of bikes in order to fill one of his special needs in one of available premises - sexual drive or having a smoke. As the fun is not free a visit in the bank may be needed as well. Intensive entertainment may require spending some time in a hotel in order to restore vital energy. The contact with a bike ends the holidays. Aside from bikes player must bypass the cars parked on the roadside.
